name: Broken computer's dream
description:
Story

Pino, an avatar left inside a computer whose data has been corrupted and discarded. Them goal is to explore the mysterious world and find the fragments of memories left behind by its owner.

Game Outline

Genre:　　　　                   Adventure

Play time:　　                   60-90 minutes

Endings pattern:                2

Production Tool:                RPG Maker MV

※There are some stages where you can't save or open the menu screen.
